nodes.bodyText:
Hmm, I am not 100% sure if this is a good idea, because you never know if a customer messed around with it.
But I tend to agree that in such a case we might need to ask explicit for that content.

nodes.bodyText: I echo @mcalmer's sentiment above - we only need to request this directory if the schema packages have been tampered with (and we have this information in the rpm verification files). So I would say this change is OK.
